name: microsoft-word-mcp-frontier
title: Microsoft Word (Frontier)
summary: Enables core Word document creation, retrieval, and commenting actions for agentic workflows.
description: Enables core Word document creation, retrieval, and commenting actions for agentic workflows.

useCases.name: Create documents
useCases.description: Create a new Word document with text or HTML content in OneDrive or a SharePoint library.

useCases.name: Retrieve document content
useCases.description: Fetch document content and metadata using a sharing link or drive/item identifier for agents to read or process.

useCases.name: Add comments
useCases.description: Programmatically add comments to a document to support review and collaboration flows.

useCases.name: Reply to comments
useCases.description: Post replies to existing comments to automate review responses or moderation workflows.

a365wordoauth2.description: Authenticate with A365 using OAuth2 authorization code flow with PKCE support.
